dynamic.isNotNull: db.[id_cgs]=#id_cgs# and exists(select 1 from Tb_Gys_Cgs as gys where gys.id_gys = db.id_gys and gys.id_cgs = db.id_cgs)

statements.sql: set transaction isolation level read uncommitted
statements.delete: set nocount on delete db from as db
statements.update: set nocount on update db from as db
statements.select:
set nocount on
select db.[id_user],db.[id_gys],db.[id_sku],db.[id_cgs],db.[id_sp],db.[sl] ,(case when (gsp.flag_stop = 1 or sku.flag_stop = 1 or gsp.flag_up = 0) then 0 else 1 end) as flag_up ,#baseurl#+sku.photo as photo ,sp.mc ,gsp.dj_base ,isnull(isnull(dj.dj_dh,gsp.dj_base),0.0) as dj_old ,(case isnull(gsp.bm_Interface,'') when '' then sku.bm else gsp.bm_Interface end) as bm_Interface ,sku.unit ,isnull(isnull(isnull(spcgs.dj_dh,dj.dj_dh),gsp.dj_base),00) as dj ,case isnull(spcgs.sl_dh_min,0) when 0 then isnull(dj.sl_dh_min,0.0) else spcgs.sl_dh_min end as sl_dh_min ,N'' as gg from as db inner join Tb_gys_sp as gsp on gsp.id_gys = db.id_gys and gsp.id_sku = db.id_sku left join Tb_sp as sp on sp.id =db.id_sp left join Tb_sp_sku as sku on sku.id = db.id_sku left join Tb_gys_cgs as gc on gc.id_gys = db.id_gys and gc.id_cgs = db.id_cgs left join Tb_sp_dj as dj on dj.id_gys = db.id_gys and dj.id_sku = db.id_sku and dj.id_cgs_level = gc.id_cgs_level LEFT JOIN Tb_sp_cgs spcgs ON db.id_sku=spcgs.id_sku AND db.id_gys=spcgs.id_gys and spcgs.id_cgs=db.id_cgs

set nocount on
select t.* from (select row_number() over() as rownumber,db.* from as db inner join Tb_gys_sp as gsp on gsp.id_gys = db.id_gys and gsp.id_sku = db.id_sku ) as t

set nocount on
select count(1) as value from as db inner join Tb_gys_sp as gsp on gsp.id_gys = db.id_gys and gsp.id_sku = db.id_sku

set nocount on
select db.[id_user],db.[id_gys],db.[id_sku],db.[id_cgs],db.[id_sp],db.[sl] from as db inner join Tb_gys_sp as gsp on gsp.id_gys = db.id_gys and gsp.id_sku = db.id_sku
